description:
Benedict Cumberbatch and Oprah Winfrey are set to present at this year's Oscars, ensuring both will be able to take the stage even if they fail to win the awards for which they're nominated. Cumberbatch is up for best actor for his role in The Imitation Game, while Winfrey, who was memorably snubbed for an acting nom last year for her role in Lee Daniels' The Butler, has another chance at Oscar gold as one of the producers of Selma.本尼迪克特·康伯巴奇（卷福）和奥普拉·温弗瑞将出席今年的奥斯卡颁奖典礼，即使不获奖也能上领奖台了。卷福因《模仿游戏》被提名最佳男主角；而去年出演《白宫管家》未获奖的温弗瑞，今年又因参与制片的《塞尔玛》来角逐奥斯卡小金人了。

Other current nominees set to take the stage as presenters include best supporting actress nominee Meryl Streep, vying for her fourth Oscar for her role in Into the Woods, and best actress nominees Reese Witherspoon (Wild) and Marion Cotillard (Two Days, One Night).另外被选为主持人的入围者有：因《魔法黑森林》而入围最佳女配角的梅丽尔·斯特里普，她来角逐第四座小金人；还有入围最佳女主角的瑞茜·威瑟斯彭（《涉足荒野》）和玛丽昂·歌迪亚（《两天一夜》）。

Previously announced presenters include last year's acting winners Lupita Nyong'o, Cate Blanchett, Jared Leto and Matthew McConaughey.还有早前已公布的主持人选，包括去年获奖的露皮塔·尼永奥、凯特·布兰切特和马修·麦康纳。

In addition, Jack Black, Common, John Legend, Rita Ora, Tim McGraw and Adam Levine are set to perform..此外，杰克·布莱克、科蒙、约翰·传奇、瑞塔·欧拉、蒂姆·麦克洛和亚当·李维将于本次奥斯卡典礼上演出。

The 2015 Oscars, hosted by Neil Patrick Harris, will take place at the Dolby Theatre at Hollywood & Highland Center on Sunday, Feb. 22. The show will air live on ABC starting at 7 p.m. ET/ 4 p.m. PT.第87届奥斯卡颁奖典礼将于2015年2月22日纽约时间晚7点（北京时间次日8点），在好莱坞杜比剧院举行，（《老爸老妈的浪漫史》男星）尼尔·帕特里克·哈里斯将担任本届奥斯卡颁奖典礼主持人。典礼将通过ABC（美国广播公司）直播。
